fw.name: CATTTRSInterfaces

class.name: CATMathComplexRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of an RGE whose TTRS class is Complex.

constructor.name: CATMathComplexRGE
constructor.abstract: Constructs a Complex RGE using a point, a line, and a plane.

method.name: GetMathLine
method.abstract: Retrieves the line making up the Complex RGE.

method.name: GetMathPlane
method.abstract: Retrieves the plane making up the Complex RGE.

method.name: GetMathPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the point making up the Complex RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Complex RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Complex RGE.

data.name: _math_line
data.abstract: The line that makes up the Complex RGE.

data.name: _math_plane
data.abstract: The plane that makes up the Complex RGE.

data.name: _math_point
data.abstract: The point that makes up the Complex RGE.

class.name: CATMathCylindricalRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of an RGE whose TTRS class is Cylindrical.

constructor.name: CATMathCylindricalRGE
constructor.abstract: Constructs a Cylindrical RGE using a line.

method.name: GetMathLine
method.abstract: Retrieves the line making up the Cylindrical RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Cylindrical RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Cylindrical RGE.

data.name: _math_line
data.abstract: The line that makes up the Cylindrical RGE.

class.name: CATMathPlanarRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of an RGE whose TTRS class is Planar.

constructor.name: CATMathPlanarRGE
constructor.abstract: Constructs a Planar RGE using a plane.

method.name: GetMathPlane
method.abstract: Retrieves the plane making up the Planar RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Planar RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Planar RGE.

data.name: _math_plane
data.abstract: The point that makes up the Planar RGE.

class.name: CATMathPrismaticRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of an RGE whose TTRS class is Prismatic.

constructor.name: CATMathPrismaticRGE
constructor.abstract: Constructs a Prismatic RGE using a line and a plane.

method.name: GetMathLine
method.abstract: Retrieves the line making up the Prismatic RGE.

method.name: GetMathPlane
method.abstract: Retrieves the plane making up the Prismatic RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Prismatic RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Prismatic RGE.

data.name: _math_line
data.abstract: The line that makes up the Prismatic RGE.

data.name: _math_plane
data.abstract: The plane that makes up the Prismatic RGE.

class.name: CATMathRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of RGEs (TTRS).

method.name: GetMathLine
method.abstract: Retrieves the line making up the RGE.

method.name: GetMathPlane
method.abstract: Retrieves the plane making up the RGE.

method.name: GetMathPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the point making up the RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the RGE.

class.name: CATMathRevoluteRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of an RGE whose TTRS class is Revolute.

constructor.name: CATMathRevoluteRGE
constructor.abstract: Constructs a Revolute RGE using a point and a line.

method.name: GetMathLine
method.abstract: Retrieves the line making up the Revolute RGE.

method.name: GetMathPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the point making up the Revolute RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Revolute RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Revolute RGE.

data.name: _math_line
data.abstract: The line that makes up the Revolute RGE.

data.name: _math_point
data.abstract: The point that makes up the Revolute RGE.

class.name: CATMathSphericalRGE
class.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of an RGE whose TTRS class is Spherical.

constructor.name: CATMathSphericalRGE
constructor.abstract: Constructs a Spherical RGE using a point.

method.name: GetMathPoint
method.abstract: Retrieves the point making up the Spherical RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Spherical RGE.

method.name: GetTTRSclass
method.abstract: Returns the TTRS class associated with the Spherical RGE.

data.name: _math_point
data.abstract: The point that makes up the Spherical RGE.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypeGeneral
define.abstract: The TTRS is a general one.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfAngularTabsSlots
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of angular tabs/slots.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfCircles
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of circles.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfCylPinsHoles
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of cylindrical pins/holes.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfCylinders
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of cylinders.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfNotCylPinsHoles
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of not cylindrical pins/holes.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfPlanes
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of planes.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfSpheres
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of spheres.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfTabsSlots
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of tabs/slots.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypePatternOfThreads
define.abstract: The TTRS is a pattern of threads.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypeRelated01
define.abstract: The TTRS is a related one.

define.name: CATMmrTTRSTypeSupport
define.abstract: The TTRS is a support one.

enum.name: CATMmrTTRSAssociationCase
enum.abstract: Typedef to describe the kind of associative case for TTRS.

enum.name: CATMmrTTRSFeatureOfSize
enum.abstract: Typedef to describe the kind of feature of size for TTRS.

enum.name: CATMmrTTRSRepresented
enum.abstract: Nature of the link beetwen a TTRS and it's represented TTRS.

enum.name: CATMmrTTRSSurfaceCanonicity
enum.abstract: Typedef to describe the kind of surface canonicity for TTRS.

enum.name: CATTTRSClass
enum.abstract: Typedef to describe the kind of admissible type for TTRS.

function.name: CATCreateCATITTRSList
function.abstract: Method to create a list of TTRS, from an optional initial list.

method.name: GetMathRGE
method.abstract: Computes its corresponding CATMathRGE.

method.name: GetReferencedGeometry
method.abstract: Returns the geometrical element associated to the RGE.

method.name: GetReferencedGeometry
method.abstract: Gets the one to three geometrical elements associated to the RGE if they exist (skeleton model).

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Gets the TTRS Class of the RGE.

method.name: ReplaceReferencedGeometry
method.abstract: Replaces the geometrical elements associated to the RGE by one to three GeometricalElements.

method.name: GetCells
method.abstract: Retreive the cells of a RGE.

method.name: GetCellsAndBodies
method.abstract: Retreive the cells and their bodies of a RGE.

method.name: GetOutsideMaterialCoefficientOnNormal
method.abstract: Retrieves the coefficient to apply on the surface normal.

method.name: GetTransformation
method.abstract: Get the transformation to apply to the cells.

class.name: CATITTRS
class.abstract: Interface representing TTRS ( Technologically and Topologically Related Surfaces ).

method.name: AddComponent
method.abstract: Adds a component to a TTRS.

method.name: GetComponents
method.abstract: Gets the list of the 2 to n components of the TTRS.

method.name: GetMRGE
method.abstract: Gets the MRGE ( Minimum Representation Geometrical Element ) of the TTRS.

method.name: GetNature
method.abstract: Returns the nature of the TTRS.

method.name: GetRepresentedTTRS
method.abstract: Retrieves the represented TTRS.

method.name: GetRepresentedTTRSLink
method.abstract: Retrieves the nature of the link with the represented TTRS.

method.name: GetTTRSClass
method.abstract: Gets the class of the TTRS.

method.name: GetValidityState
method.abstract: Returns the state of validity of the TTRS.

method.name: RemoveComponent
method.abstract: Removes a component from a TTRS.

method.name: SetRepresentedTTRS
method.abstract: Sets the represented TTRS.

method.name: SetRepresentedTTRSLink
method.abstract: Sets the nature fo teh link with the represented TTRS.

class.name: CATITTRSAdvanced
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to manage some additional informations about TTRS.

method.name: GetAdmissibleType
method.abstract: Retrieves the admissible type of TTRS.

method.name: GetAssociationCase
method.abstract: Retrieves the association case of the TTRS Applicable only when the TTRS has two components.

method.name: GetFeatureOfSize
method.abstract: Retrieves the Feature Of Size status of TTRS.

method.name: GetRelativePositionalParameterCount
method.abstract: Retrieves the count of relative positional parameters.

method.name: GetSurfaceCanonicity
method.abstract: Retrieves the surface canonicity of the surfaces referenced by the TTRS.

method.name: ValidateNewAdmissibleType
method.abstract: Validates the new admissible type as the reference for the next evaluations of TTRS status.

method.name: ValidateNewAssociationCase
method.abstract: Validates the new association case as the reference for the next evaluations of TTRS status.

method.name: ValidateNewFeatureOfSize
method.abstract: Validates the new feature of size state as the reference for the next evaluations of TTRS status.

method.name: ValidateNewPositionalParamCount
method.abstract: Validates the new count of relative positional parameters as the reference for the next evaluations of TTRS status.

method.name: ValidateNewSurfaceCanonicity
method.abstract: Validates the new surface canonicity as the reference for the next evaluations of TTRS status.

method.name: ValidateNewTTRSClass
method.abstract: Validates the new TTRS class as the reference for the next evaluations of TTRS status.

class.name: CATITTRSGeometry
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to ask features implementing this interface in order to get associated geometry/topology.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Add an element at a given position in the list.

method.name: Count
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of elements in the list.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Retrieves the element number i.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Remove an element from the list.

typedef.name: CATMmrTTRSAdmissibleType
typedef.abstract: Typedef to describe the kind of admissible type for TTRS.

typedef.name: CATMmrTTRSValidityState
typedef.abstract: Type definition for TTRS validity state.
